body.name: Remote Control Car, Transform Robot RC Cars, 2.4Ghz Transforming Police Car Toy with LED Light, One-Button Deformation & Rotating Drifting, Toys for 5+ Year Boys/Girls

features: 2-in-1 RC Transforming Car Robot: LNNKINE Remote Control Car -When you press the button on the remote control, this remote-control transforming car can easily switch between car and robot smoothly. Children can enjoy the fun brought by the automatic demonstration function.

360-Degree Rotation: Equipped with drifting tire, our RC car allows for flexible 360-degree rotation in both car and robot form. With cool LED police lights and a realistic 1:18 scale, kids can enjoy endless hours of fun and adventure.

2.4GHz & No Interference: Our remote control uses 2.4GHz technology, allowing multiple cars to be played with simultaneously without any interference. Perfect for playdates or racing with friends. This RC car is easy to operate for children with controllers and can fully control the speed while moving forwards, backwards, or turning.

New Design Upgrades and Thicker Materials: The remote control car has an additional axle wheel design inside, making the car and robot transform back and forth without binding and getting stuck. This transforming robot car is made of sturdy ABS plastic and high-quality rubber tires. It Runs well indoors or on outdoor surfaces.

Perfect Gift for Kids: Looking for a unique and exciting gift for a boy or girl? Look no further than the LNNKINE Remote Control Car. With its appealing box packaging, this transforming police car makes the perfect present for birthdays, Christmas, holidays, parties, and any other special occasion.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 2.4GHz remote control transforming car The remote-control distance can reach 165 feet. The 2.4 GHz remote control supports two or more cars to race at the same time without interfering with each other. 360° Rotating Drifting This robot car toy has 5 smooth wheels and can perform ultra-fast drift 360° turns in robot or car mode. Offering much fun for kids who love cars and toys. One-Click Transforming 2 in 1 remote control transforming robot car, one-click to achieve two ways to play, allowing your child to easily transform from car to robot and back at any time and anywhere.

Built-in flexible Spin the Wheel Built-in flexible Spin the Wheel, remote operation can move the car forward, backward, left, right, rotate and transform. High-quality Rubber Tires This robot car toy is made of high-quality scratch-resistant ABS plastic material and high-quality rubber tires, which will not harm children and is a perfect gift for kids. Package Contains 1 x 1:18 Scale Transformer Car 1 x 2.4 GHz Remote Control 1 x User Manual

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars "Exciting and Durable - A Must-Have Toy!"
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the LNNKINE Remote Control Car, and I must say, it exceeded my expectations. This transforming robot RC car is an absolute blast for kids aged 5 and above. The one-button deformation and rotating drifting feature are not only entertaining but also easy to operate.The LED lights add an exciting visual element, making it even more captivating. The build quality is solid, and it's clear that this toy is designed to last. The versatility of this toy, switching from a police car to a robot, keeps kids engaged for hours.Overall, I highly recommend the LNNKINE Remote Control Car for its durability, easy operation, and sheer entertainment value. It's a fantastic gift for young boys and girls, and it's bound to provide hours of fun and imaginative play.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good fun toy for kids
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I love how easily it converts from a car to a robot. And the lights makes it fun for kids. my son goes crazy playing with this. Decent quality and worth the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my five year old grandson for Christmas. Of all his other toys, he plays with this the most. It was a great buy and wonderful gift!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: What amazing toy. Great gift. My grandson's favorite toy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Kids loved it
reviews.reviewText: Perfect gift for friend's son. It is built well and functions properly. Great gift at a great price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Impressed me and my 4 yr old nephew. Turned out to be a great inexpensive gift!
reviews.reviewText: Works exactly as advertised. After all the other toys he received, my nephew kept coming back to this one. Car was easy to transform..drove on hardwood and carpet. It states for ages 8 and up but at 4 he was able to operate it with ease. Please note that it did take 5 yes 5 AA batteries to operate (2 for the remote and 3 for the car). I opened ahead of time to install the batteries so it would work upon opening and getting the packaging back was a chore but worth it. Very pleased.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So much fun
reviews.reviewText: We got this as a gift and it has exceeded our expectations. It is easy to maneuver and fun to play with.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My 4 1/2 year old son loves this transforming car. He has been playing with it constantly. The way it can move is impressive! His 8 year old brother likes it too but doesn’t get many turns with it. It needs to be on a hard flat surface, but once you have those conditions it spins, speeds forward/backward, and transforms with ease.
